casebody.data:
State ex rel. Lentz
v.
Dept. of Rehab. & Corr. 2018-0445 Supreme Court of Ohio. June 6, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus. On respondent's motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed.
